content.prompt: The excerpt best serves as evidence for which of the following developments in the late 1800s?

choices.label: The impact of the construction of transcontinental railroads on United States commerce
The growing support for labor unions among the owners of corporations
The emergence of arguments that wealthy people had a moral obligation to help society
The decline of urban centers as immigrant populations moved westward

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
